NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Alabama Educational TV Commission
807 Protective Life Building
Birmingham, Alabama
February 16, 1961
Mr. William G. Harley
President
N.A.E.B.
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
I note in your confidential memorandum as of February 14, 1961, that you ^
agreed to take an assignment at the DAVI Convention in Miami as of April 22.
Do I understand by this that you are cancelling your appearance at the
Region II Conference in Birmingham on April 22, 1961?
Your memorandum of February 9, 1961, states that: "Because the TV members
of the Board will be on hand anyway (at Center expense), this occasion proÂ¬
vides an opportunity for assembling the entire Board and taking up some matters
that need reporting or policy decision." Farther on you state, "Board members
^ not attending as Center Affiliates should make their own reservations using the
enclosed card." No card was enclosed in my communication, and so I do not
understand provisions thereon. The two statements above quoted from your
memorandum do not agree for certainly as a TV Board member myself I am not
included in the invitation that the Center is giving. Before making any decisions
or statements in this connection, I will await a reply from you. The earliest
possible response to the above questions will be appreciated.
Sincerely yours,
